Send us a Message

Warning: We get a lot of messages and responses may take longer than you would like. Please try searching on this knowledge base, or try the huge list of communities for more immediate help.

We work from the oldest message first. For this reason, sending multiple messages will further delay response times. Please be patient.


Please check these articles about accessing your wallet BEFORE messaging us. It's the holidays. Responding may take a while.
